description: Install a Replicated application with kubectl-kots for testing. This task takes several shortcuts for configuration and security which are not suitable for production use. It is not idempotent.

license_content.description: YAML contents of the license file for the replicated application to install

password.description: Password to use for the kots admin-console, for the application, and possibly for any other internal passwords (databases?) in the generated app config.

hostname.description: The resolvable hostname to use when configuring the application.

kots_namespace.description: The k8s namespace we're operating in.

config_content.description: YAML configuration for an automated install of the replicated application. If not provided, a basic config will be generated by the task.

kots_install_options.description: Additional parameters to pass to `kubectl-kots install`.

airgap_bundle.description: Path on the target of an airgap bundle to install instead of using online installation.
